text: Jan David Simon, 3rd Viscount Simon (20 July 1940 â€“ 15 August 2021) was a British hereditary peer. He was member of the House of Lords from 1994 until his death. Simon was a member of the Labour Party. His father was the 2nd Viscount Simon. Simon died on 15 August 2021 at the age of 81.Recently deceased ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Labour members of the House of Lords Category:United Kingdom Viscounts
